message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in your product, but I can't afford $150. How about we start at $120?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you in the middle at $140.
Thank you for your offer, but I still think $120 would be fair. Can we meet there?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can offer you a slight discount at $130. It's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your offer, but I really can't go above $120. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?
I'm not willing to go as low as $120, but I'm willing to make one last offer. I can give you a slight discount at $135. This is my final offer.
I'm sorry, but I still think $120 would be fair. Can we meet there?

I'm not willing to budge from my price of $135. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm open to other buyers who are willing to pay a higher price.
